attributes.action: DO NOT FORCE EVERYONE TO UNLOCK WIFI
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Do not force everyone to unlock there wifi/wimax internet to the public ,as this could give criminals free access to the internet

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
